Conociendo de primera mano las grandes necesidades del país, así como de otras personas en el resto del planeta, quise ayudar de alguna forma. Ojalá lo esté logrando. ¡Viva México!

lenders.name: gary
lenders.loan_because:
I suppose the simple answer to that is that I wish to help others to reach their potential. Through Kiva I can, in a small way, make that happen.

I have 2 beliefs that I try to live by : 

- Give people food & their hunger will be quenched; show people how to plant & they will never have to be hungry again.

- Treat others as you would like to be treated; what goes around comes around.

I believe that Kiva follows these principles.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design, setup, run and market online ventures as well as helping others achieve success.

An example is below.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I view this as constructive savings.  The delinquency rate is low, the 'interest' 'earned'  is someone else's potential success.   I'd rather trust these good people than my bank!   I invest an additional $50/month just like it's savings but I know it's not supporting a banker's mistakes, it's now influencing the success of an entrepener who wouldn't otherwise be qualified for credit.   

Just about to hit $10,000 mark in overall loans (I roll payments back to new loans).

lenders.loan_because: I wish to give to your good cause.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to inpact the world and inspire others to do so as well.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.occupation: Student, Georgia Southern Univ., Class of 2012
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help others who are struggling to survive, yet still have hope for a better future.  I want to begin early in life having a tradition of sharing my advantages and good fortune while making meaningful contributions that change the lives of others. 

 I am fortunate that I have been able to recruit active team members to join the Georgia Southern University Alumni Team.  However, this team is not just for alumni, and all are welcome to join and participate. Especially invited are the individuals and their families who are associated with Georgia Southern University.  You will be very pleased and satisfied with your experience with helping the working poor.
lenders.occupational_info:
Full time student,  part time work in construction, short term projects, and Vice President of Felker Grant Racing.

I am inspired by these quotes, the first from the Team India Kiva Group: 

"I must refuse to insult the naked by giving them clothes they do not need, instead of giving them work which they sorely need. I will not commit the sin of becoming their patron but, on learning that I had assisted in impoverishing them, I would give them neither crumbs nor cast off clothing, but the best of my food and clothes and associate myself with them in work." - Mahatma Gandhi

"When you feel discouraged or simply lazy, as is bound to happen sometimes, remember the millions of people in the world who have not had your privilege. Remember the poor and obscure lives of those countless millions who suffer from every sort of deprivation and frequently find themselves the unwilling victim of wars, and a variety of cruelties, perpetuated by man on man." - Jehan Sadat 

"Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -Mark Twain

lenders.name: Shilpa
lenders.loan_because: I have some to share !

lenders.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I find companies that do research and development and then help them get money back from the government.

lenders.name: Johann
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I write hi-tech software that help trains stay on rails and in time

lenders.name: charmaine
lenders.loan_because: It was a gift from my sister-in-law and her husband.  It is exciting to offer help to others in order achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help get people the appropriate compensation for their disabilities.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I lend because I can. I try to support organizations that I truly believe in. Along with lending to Kiva, I regularly donate to Heifer International and Wisconsin Public Radio.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: its an easy way to make a difference in someone's life

lenders.name: Cristian
lenders.loan_because: In some small way I would like to help other entrepreneurs who are less fortunate or lack the resources to improve their businesses and lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I design web sites for a living, and enjoy the daily process of creating and communicating online every single day.

lenders.name: Kaisi
lenders.loan_because: People should always be trying to help each other, even when they feel like they themselves need help.  Eventually, everything comes back around.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those people that are willing to work but need a bit of financial help to get going. My background is in motorcycling so I respect those that work with motorcycles. This is reflected in my loans to workers in the Motorcycle Transport and Repair Industry. Good Luck to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a Police Motorcyclist but have now retired from the Police.  I run a motorcycle training school, teaching people how to ride.

lenders.name: Erwann
lenders.loan_because: I want to reward entrepreneurship for the better good and I can do it! :-)

lenders.name: Elise, Pam, Mel, Kim, Jess
lenders.loan_because: we are a group of youngish girls who want to share the chance for other women to succeed in the world

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: He said, "... you have done it unto Me..."
lenders.occupational_info: The best work in the world ... I share the Good News

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I loan because 'there but by the grace of God go I'.

lenders.name: Cal
lenders.occupational_info: I am a spiritual leader for a community of Christians.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I realize how incredibly fortunate I am - and I have faith in others.
lenders.occupational_info: My company produces video for all things good.

lenders.name: Social Canvas
lenders.occupational_info: We auction clothing and art to benefit charitable causes.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world
lenders.occupational_info: I solve problems

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children to appreciate all the blessings we have in our lives, and about ways to help others who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homeschooling mom, which means I teach my own children at home, rather than sending them to school.  I also help my husband with his business.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I'm a small business owner, too, and I am passionate about helping other business owners -- especially women -- to grown their businesses, support their families and strengthen their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I write, speak, teach and advise other business owners on how to win government contracts. And I've just written a book about it! www.governmentcontractsmadeeasier.com!
